# Welcome, Prospective Students!

<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-2">
<p style="text-align:center;"><img src="/images/culogo.png"></p>
</div>
<div class="col-md-10">**We're thrilled that you're here!** On this site, you will find everything you need to help you navigate through your (virtual) Prospective Visit Days with the [Columbia University Psychology Department](https://psychology.columbia.edu/){target="_blank"}. 

If any questions arise, please feel free to reach out to us anytime, either by using our [Slack channel](https://join.slack.com/t/prospie-2021/shared_invite/zt-mf2etqtd-b5INJm4ZXBQiH0nfu5kBsw){target="_blank"}, or by contacting one of the Prospective Visit Days coordinators via email: [Jacob Edwards](mailto:je2527@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}, [Manasi Jayakumar](mailto:mj2873@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}, and [Anna Vannucci](mailto:av2902@columbia.edu){target="_blank"}.
</div>
</div>
